Source code for source.cfg.ctrl_vector_syrm_7kW

# pylint: disable=C0103
"""
This script configures sensorless vector control for a 6.7-kW synchronous
reluctance motor.

"""
# %%
from __future__ import annotations
from dataclasses import dataclass
import numpy as np
from control.sm.torque import TorqueCharacteristics


# %%
@dataclass

[docs]class BaseValues:
    """
    This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values.
    These are used for plotting the results.

    """
    # pylint: disable=too-many-instance-attributes

[docs]    w: float = 2*np.pi*105.8


[docs]    i: float = np.sqrt(2)*15.5


[docs]    u: float = np.sqrt(2/3)*370


[docs]    p: int = 2


[docs]    psi: float = u/w


[docs]    P: float = 1.5*u*i


[docs]    Z: float = u/i


[docs]    L: float = Z/w


[docs]    tau: float = p*P/w



# %% Define the controller parameters
@dataclass

[docs]class CtrlParameters:
    """
    This data class contains parameters for the control system of a 6.7-kW
    synchronous relutance motor.

    """
    # pylint: disable=too-many-instance-attributes

[docs]    sensorless: bool = False

    # Sampling period

[docs]    T_s: float = 250e-6

    # Bandwidths

[docs]    alpha_c: float = 2*np.pi*200


[docs]    alpha_fw: float = 2*np.pi*20


[docs]    alpha_s: float = 2*np.pi*4

    # Maximum values

[docs]    tau_M_max: float = 2*20.1


[docs]    i_s_max: float = 2*np.sqrt(2)*15.5


[docs]    i_sd_min: float = .25*np.sqrt(2)*15.5  # Can be 0 in the sensored mode

    # Voltage margin

[docs]    k_u: float = .95

    # Nominal values

[docs]    u_dc_nom: float = 540


[docs]    w_nom: float = 2*np.pi*105.8

    # Motor parameter estimates

[docs]    R_s: float = 0.54


[docs]    L_d: float = 41.5e-3


[docs]    L_q: float = 6.2e-3


[docs]    psi_f: float = 0


[docs]    p: int = 2


[docs]    J: float = .015

    # Observer

[docs]    w_o: float = 2*np.pi*80     # Used only in the sensorless mode

    # Look-up tables to be generated subsequently

[docs]    i_sd_mtpa = None


[docs]    i_sd_lim = None


[docs]    tau_M_lim = None



# %%

[docs]base = BaseValues()


[docs]pars = CtrlParameters()


# %% Generate LUTs

[docs]tq = TorqueCharacteristics(pars)


[docs]mtpa = tq.mtpa_locus(i_s_max=pars.i_s_max)


[docs]lims = tq.mtpv_and_current_limits(i_s_max=pars.i_s_max)

# MTPA locus

[docs]pars.i_sd_mtpa = mtpa.i_sd_vs_tau_M

# Merged MTPV and current limits

[docs]pars.tau_M_lim = lims.tau_M_vs_abs_psi_s


[docs]pars.i_sd_lim = lims.i_sd_vs_tau_M


# Plot loci and characteristics
if __name__ == '__main__':
    tq.plot_current_loci(pars.i_s_max, base)
    # tq.plot_flux_loci(pars.i_s_max, base)
    tq.plot_torque_flux(pars.i_s_max, base)
    tq.plot_torque_current(pars.i_s_max, base)
    # tq.plot_angle_torque(base.psi, base)
